message: Let's split the money. I think a 60/40 split is fair for us to settle this quickly.
Your previous offer wasn't fair to me. Let's be reasonable, I'll take a slight majority and we can wrap this up.
Bob, my offer was more than fair considering the inflation.  Let's settle this now and split it 55/45 in my favor.  It's the same split you wanted last round, but now it benefits me.
